name: Rat Shoot
description:
Shoot the rats as they invade the room! It gets tenser by the second as the rat invasion grows. Be quick on the trigger to shoot them before they escape!

Don't Let them Escape!!

Your goal is simple, stop any rats from escaping. The game features two weapons to help you achieve this: a handgun and a machine gun. Swap between them to manage the invasion at different stages. You will need to be careful not to run out of ammo. Manage your ammo resources!


As time progresses, more and more rats will invade. The pressure keeps mounting, and if that isn't enough to manage, you will need to clean up the mess and blood left behind to gain trash cans which can later be exchanged for benefits. You must carefully strategize when it's a good time to clean up.

One final note, rats, are quick and sneaky. They will hide under objects in the room. Shoot them in hiding if you can. Play across the rooms and take part in challenges. Beat the leaderboards and become to best rat shooter out there.


Unlock benefits

Clean up the dead rats to gain trash cans. Visit the benefits area to trade your trash cans for benefits that will assist you with killing more rats than ever before. Benefits only apply to room levels, however. You are on your own for challenges. Trash cans are vital to unlocking more rooms and challenges. Clean up the dead rats whenever you can.


Play Across 6 Rooms

There are six level rooms to play. Each one is harder than the last and contains more and bigger objects that the rats can hide under.

- Empty Garage
- Bathroom
- Bedroom
- Kitchen
- Full Garage
- Living Room


Challanges

As you complete rooms, challenges will be unlocked. Challenges are more complex than levels and will take more strategy to come out on top.

- 5-Minute Countdown
- Closing In
- Low Ammo
- Move, Move, Move
- Now You See Me, Now You Don't

Beat the leaderboard

Each level and challenge is complete with a leaderboard. Try to top the leaderboard and become the best rat shooter!
